'''Morfydd Clark''' is a Welsh actress. She has portrayed [[Galadriel]] in Amazon's ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' television series.<ref>[http://www.empireonline.com Empire Online], "[https://www.empireonline.com/movies/news/morfydd-clark-talks-galadriel-amazon-lord-of-the-rings-series/ Morfydd Clark On Being Cast As Galadriel In Amazon’s Lord Of The Rings Series]", 29 September 2020 (accessed 29 October 2020)</ref>

==Quotes==
{{quote|Well, because I was a fan of the films, it felt like going on a pilgrimage. I was like, finally I’m here!.|Morfydd Clark, Another Mag}}
{{quote|I do not hang off a horse in that incredible way. The horse stunt team were incredible, but also the horses were incredible. And actually seeing them say goodbye to each other was really emotional because they were like really saying thank you to their horses for keeping them safe while they were doing crazy, crazy things. And honestly watching that being filmed, I’ve never been so tense. Because it just doesn’t look like that should be possible and [it’s] absolutely incredible.|Morfydd Clark, Decider}}

==Awards==
* [[2023]] - '''[https://canneseries.com/en/ Canneseries]''', Madame Figaro Rising Star Award, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''
